price: 11. y cada vez que se presentaba ante ellos un mensajero Nuestro, se burlaban de él (como se burlan también de ti).
arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā yatīhim min rasūlin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
